data.prayer: Over 74.46 percent of the people of Salamat are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Salamat, Chad
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 18,226 believers in Salamat to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.section_summary: On average, 32 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Salamat, Chad.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Salamat, Chad.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Salamat.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Disa people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 186,456 who are far from you in Salamat, Chad from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Salamat to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Salamat, Chad has a population of 250,400.

We estimate Salamat has 18,226 people who might know Jesus, 45,719 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 186,456 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Salamat, Chad by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
